item.title: Aurora's Autonomous Trucking Model 'Hopeless,' Says Short Seller Kerrisdale Capital: 'We're Short $AUR'
item.description: Short seller Kerrisdale Capital shorts Aurora ($AUR), calling its autonomous trucking model "hopeless" and a "dead end" in a new report. read more

item.title: Trump Set To Appear At Ryder Cup's First Day In New York, Says Keegan Bradley Should 'Definitely' Be On The Team
